https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sVbPy5Hq0WYTRMEzCRROk2zSNtZ.jpg True love never dies, the loving heart never stops beating ... for Kerstinâ€™s ex Thomas, who she still hopes will come back some day. Instead of Thomas, her mother Charlotte shows up at her door, mid-50s and freshly single again, too. Charlotte moves in with Kerstin and her flatmates, one of who shows her how to use a modern dating app to meet new men. As mom starts dating again, her daughter refuses to let digital reality intrude on her romantic daydreams. Beat Beat Heart
